title: The Darkness' Kiss
description: Savannah was a psychic, but a reluctant one. How could she love her gift when it showed her only the dead ones? But when her bestfriend Cassie went missing and she began showing herself to her, Savannah knew she has to use her gift to find her body and her murderer. And she also needed Spencer, her ex-boyfriend who happened to be Cassie's brother and a former FBI agent. Cassie's body bore the signs of numerous women who'd gone missing and turned up murdered. They had to find the serial killer so that no other woman would suffer Cassie and the others' fates.But what if that killer was someone she knew? Could her gift or Cassie warn her about the danger?Can't stand the suspense? Download and find out what happens next!READER ADVISORY: This story contains content that includes sex and erotic themes. All of the characters are 18 years of age or older.
author: Sandra Ross
